title: 1BR APARTMENT| LEASING IN AUBURN GRESHAM w/ HEAT INCLUDED| $975
posting_body: ['"Virtual and video tours available!', 'Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!', 'All you need is an internet connection."', 'Call 312-428-4861 to schedule a tour!', 'Location: Near 79th and Wolcott', '1 Bedroom $975 (640 sqft) -Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', 'Rental includes: ☑Heat included ☑Dining room ☑Hardwood floors ☑Pre-wired phone/cable', 'This apartment is in the Gresham (60620) neighborhood in Chicago.', "Nearby parks include Dawes Park, O'Hallaren Park, and Foster Park.", 'Like what you see?', 'We have plenty of units available in Chicago, Park Forest, Sauk Village, West Austin, Maywood, Broadview, and many more.', '**NOTE**', 'If replying by email please remember to include your phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.', '***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and may not be pictures of the actual unit.', '"Pangea is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider".', 'Call 312-428-4861 to schedule a tour!', '“Pangea Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.', 'Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.', ' As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter.”', 'ID: c7953wol']
